title: The Collector
description: A woman unknowingly becomes the target of a dangerous man, The Collector.
altHero: Anne Laurent in a white blazer looks back at the camera in front of a large window
alt1: Laurent stands with a man in a suit who lights a cigarette
alt3: at a public pool, a young boy points in the air and Laurent looks
alt4: Laurent and a man embrace, still wet from the pool
